title: UCLA Integrated Staging System (UISS) for Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC)
desc: UCLA Integrated Staging System (UISS) for Renal Cell Carcinoma (RCC) provides 5-year disease-free prognosis for localized and metastatic RCC.
